verses.verse: <S%H8199>Vindicate<s%> <S%H430>me,<s%> God, and <S%H7378>plead<s%> my <S%H7379>cause<s%> against an <S%H3808>ungodly<s%> <S%H1471>nation.<s%> <S%H6403>Oh,<s%> deliver me from <S%H4820>deceitful<s%> and <S%H5766>wicked<s%> <S%H376>men.<s%>

For you are the <S%H430>God<s%> of my <S%H4581>strength.<s%> Why have you <S%H2186>rejected<s%> <S%H1980>me?<s%> Why do I go <S%H6937>mourning<s%> because of the <S%H3906>oppression<s%> of the <S%H341>enemy?<s%>

<S%H7971>Oh,<s%> send out your <S%H216>light<s%> and your <S%H571>truth.<s%> Let them <S%H5148>lead<s%> <S%H935>me.<s%> Let them bring me to your <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2022>hill,<s%> To your <S%H4908>tents.<s%>

Then I will <S%H935>go<s%> to the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> to <S%H410>God,<s%> my <S%H8057>exceeding<s%> <S%H1524>joy.<s%> I will <S%H3034>praise<s%> you on the <S%H3658>harp,<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> my <S%H430>God.<s%>

Why are you in <S%H7817>despair,<s%> my <S%H5315>soul?<s%> Why are you <S%H1993>disturbed<s%> within <S%H3176>me?<s%> Hope in <S%H430>God!<s%> For I shall still <S%H3034>praise<s%> <S%H6440>him:<s%> my Savior, my <S%H3444>helper,<s%> and my <S%H430>God.<s%>
